    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnimationConfig
    Contains animation and timing-related constants for the Tetris application.
    Board
     
    Brick
    Represents a Tetris piece (tetromino) in the game.
    BrickGenerator
    Generates and manages the sequence of Tetris pieces during gameplay.
    BrickRotator
    Manages the rotation state of Tetris pieces during gameplay.
    ClearRow
    Represents the result of a line clearing operation in Tetris.
    DownData
    Encapsulates the result of a downward piece movement operation.
    EventSource
    Indicates the source of a game input event.
    EventType
    Represents the type of movement or action for a Tetris piece.
    GameConstants
    Contains game-related constants used throughout the Tetris application.
    GameController
    Central controller responsible for handling game logic, state transitions, and communication between the model (Board) and the GUI layer (GuiController).
    GameInputHandler
    Handles keyboard input for the Tetris game.
    GameInputHandler.MoveDownCallback
    Functional interface for move down callbacks.
    GameInputHandler.RefreshBrickCallback
    Functional interface for refresh brick callbacks.
    GameTimeline
    Manages the game's main timeline for automatic piece dropping.
    GuiController
    Main controller for the Tetris game GUI.
    HighScoreManager
    Manages high scores and leaderboards for different game modes.
    HighScoreManager.GameMode
    Represents the available game modes for score tracking.
    InputEventListener
    Defines callbacks for game input events and state queries.
    LeaderboardView
    Handles the display and formatting of leaderboard data.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Tetris JavaFX application.
    MatrixOperations
    Provides utility methods for matrix operations in Tetris gameplay.
    MoveEvent
    Represents the source of a piece movement event in the game.
    NextShapeInfo
    Represents information about a piece's next rotation state.
    NotificationPanel
    Displays animated score notifications during gameplay.
    PieceRenderer
    Handles the rendering of Tetris pieces on various display panels.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Generates Tetris pieces using the "bag" randomization system.
    Score
    Manages the player's score during gameplay.
    SimpleBoard
    Implements the game board for Tetris gameplay.
    TetrisColor
    Enum representing Tetris piece colors with their corresponding color codes.
    Theme
    Enum representing available UI themes for the Tetris game.
    Theme.ThemeType
    Enum distinguishing between gradient and image-based themes.
    ThemeManager
    Manages visual themes for the Tetris application.
    UIConstants
    Defines UI-related layout, spacing, and sizing constants used across the Tetris application's graphical interface.
    UIState
    Enum representing the different UI states and screens in the Tetris application.
    ViewData
    Encapsulates rendering data for the current and next Tetris pieces.
    ViewManager
    Manages the visibility and state transitions of different UI screens and menus.
